name: Aman Pratap Singh
summary: Full Stack Developer with 2.8 years of experience delivering production-grade web platforms. Proven expertise in designing async REST APIs, optimizing PostgreSQL, and containerizing services. Strong focus on clean architecture, performance improvements, and cross-functional collaboration.

description: Developed over 30+ secure RESTful APIs using Python and MSSQL, integrating robust authentication (JWT/OAuth2) and encryption protocols for data security.
Optimized backend logic and query performance, achieving a 10% reduction in API response time through code refactoring and MSSQL tuning.
Engineered scalable solutions for the Safeobuddy platform, improving UX and increasing traffic by 15% through better API structuring and frontend-backend synergy.
Collaborated with a travel agency to deliver a production-grade booking platform built using React.js and FastAPI.
Reduced frontend load time by 20% and automated 90% of manual ops.
